title: 1 Thessalonians 2:7
author: joshualinog
excerpt: # overview How should this passage be translated and interpreted?
content:
# overview
How should this passage be translated and interpreted?

## passage 

1 Thessalonians 2:7
SBLGNT δυνάμενοι ἐν βάρει εἶναι ὡς Χριστοῦ ἀπόστολοι· ἀλλὰ ἐγενήθημεν ⸀ἤπιοι ἐν μέσῳ ὑμῶν, ὡς ⸀ἐὰν τροφὸς θάλπῃ τὰ ἑαυτῆς τέκνα·
YLT But we became gentle in your midst, as a nurse may cherish her own children,
LEB Although we could have insisted on our own importance as apostles of Christ, yet we became infants in your midst, like a nursing mother cherishes her own children.
